330        Objects.requireNonNull(previousVersion, Record.class + ": previousVersion is missing");

332        Objects.requireNonNull(modifiedBy, Record.class + ": modifiedBy is missing");
333        Objects.requireNonNull(modifiedAt, Record.class + ": modifiedAt is missing");
334        Objects.requireNonNull(label, Record.class + ": label is missing");
335        Objects.requireNonNull(previousLabel, Record.class + ": previousLabel is missing");
336        Objects.requireNonNull(changes, Record.class + ": changes is missing");
337        Objects.requireNonNull(resource, Record.class + ": resource is missing");
338        Objects.requireNonNull(stores, Record.class + ": stores is missing");
339        Objects.requireNonNull(withoutChanges, Record.class + ": withoutChanges is missing");
340        return new RecordImpl(version, previousVersion, type, modifiedBy, modifiedAt, label, previousLabel, changes,
341            resource, stores, withoutChanges);
